subject: Physical Fitness
title: Title IX Changed Everything
description: A quick win: understand Title IX Changed Everything.

hook.text: In 1972, a 37-word American law transformed women's fitness forever. It's called Title IX.

buildup.text: Title IX required equal funding for women's sports in schools receiving federal money. Doors flew open.

discovery.text: Before Title IX, 1 in 27 girls played school sports. After, the number surged to 1 in 3.

twist.text: The law was written about education, not sports specifically. Its athletic impact was an unintended consequence.

climax.text: Title IX created generations of women athletes who would have never had the opportunity otherwise.

punchline.text: Thirty-seven words opened the door. Millions of women athletes walked through.

quiz.question: What was the effect of Title IX on girls' sports participation?
options: It increased from 1 in 27 to 1 in 3 girls playing school sports
